api.title: API
api.description: The Freifunk Community API version you use

metacommunity.title: Metacommunity
metacommunity.description: The name of your meta community. if you local community belongs to a bigger community

location.title: Location
location.description: Position data such as a postal address or geographic coordinates

city.title: City
city.description: name of your city or region

address.description: The address of the place you meet

Name.title: Name of your place
Name.description: the name of place you meet

Zipcode.title: ZIP
Zipcode.description: the zip code of your meeting place

email.title: Email
email.description: Email address to which other people can contact your community

facebook.title: facebook
facebook.description: URL to your community's facebook account

identica.title: Identica
identica.description: URL to your community's identica account

ml.title: Mailinglist
ml.description: The email address of your mailing list. If you use google groups then the email looks like your-group@googlegroups.com

phone.title: Phone
phone.description: if your community has a phone number

googleplus.title: Google+
googleplus.description: URL to your community's g+ account

twitter.title: Twitter
twitter.description: URL to your community's twitter account

events.title: Events
events.description: URL to your calendar ics file that can be imported to a global calendar

timeline.description: These are lifetime events something like date of birth (and rebirth :-) of your community or other important milestones

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: ISO timestamp when the event happened

category.title: Feed category
category.description: category of the feed like blog entries, forum messages, wiki articles, ...

type.title: Feed type
type.description: type of the feed like rss, atom, xml

state.description: A collection of status-related data. Actual open/closed status, icons, last change timestamp etc.

lastchange.title: Last Change
lastchange.description: At what (unix) timestamp has your community status lastly changed?

message.title: Message
message.description: A free-form string something like 'open for public', 'members only' or whatever you want it to be)

nodeMaps.description: maps of nodes or topology your community provides

url.title: Url of the map
url.description: the url where the map is located

interval.title: interval
interval.description: how often the map will be refreshed

technicalType.title: map technical type
technicalType.description: the kind of map is used

mapType.title: map type human readable
mapType.description: the kind of data the map provides

techDetails.description: technical details of your community's freifunk implementation

stoererhaftung.title: Störerhaftung
stoererhaftung.description: how the German störerhaftung is handled

bootstrap.title: Bootstrap
bootstrap.description: how to deal with fresh routers

url.title: Firmware download and docs
url.description: link to your firmware images or docs

ipv6.description: ipv6 networks used by your community

ipv4.description: ipv4 networks used by your community

netmask.description: the netmask valid for this network

routing.title: Routing protocol
routing.description: routing protocol used within your community

splashpage.title: Splash Page
splashpage.description: what kind of splashpage does your community use?

topodata.title: Topology data
topodata.description: link to your topology data (dot-files? needs to be defined)

updatemode.title: Updatemode
updatemode.description: how do you deploy firmware updates?
